document_data.caption: A map showing Ward's Way in the Dock Ward.
document_data.name: Ward's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Ward's Way''' was a small road located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The road was found in southern Waterdeep within the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] and [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. Ward's Way  ran north to south, originating on [[Soothsayer's Way]] just south of [[Castle Waterdeep]] and branching south to end at [[Belnimbra's Street]]. Along its length Ward's Way was intersected by [[Lackpurse Lane]], [[Rainrun Street]], and [[Arun's Alley]].
